trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSETCVOYAGERMOOGLE_00566_VOYAGERMOOGLE_00001<tab>Just wait until you see what I have to trade, kupo. All sorts of trinkets and baubles I'm positive you adventurer types will like... If only I could remember where I put it all.
TEXT_CTSETCVOYAGERMOOGLE_00566_MOGGUIDEBOOK_00001<tab>The Mogpendium will prove to be an invaluable resource during the Moogle Treasure Trove, kupo!
TEXT_CTSETCVOYAGERMOOGLE_00566_MOGGUIDEBOOK_00002<tab>Pore over its contents to find the best ways to get your hands on irregular tomestones, then use that knowledge to fill your packs!
TEXT_CTSETCVOYAGERMOOGLE_00566_MOGGUIDEBOOK_00003<tab>And once the weight of your tomestones becomes too much to bear, bring them to me and I'll give you all sorts of rare and remarkable items!
